DOC.brief_summary: This study compare three consistency lot ProQuad well M-M-R II Varivax , administer concomitantly different injection site , respect immunogenicity , safety , tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Immunogenicity 3 Frozen ProQuad Consistency Lots Healthy Children ( V221-012 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: In good health Negative clinical history measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster Previous receipt measles , mumps , rubella and/or varicella vaccine either alone combination Any immune impairment deficiency Exposure measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster 4 week prior vaccination Vaccination inactive vaccine past 14 day Vaccination live vaccine within past 30 day
